translation.en: [woman 2] Honey, this is just what labor feels like, okay?
[woman 2] There's nothing wrong. You're fine. It's all in your head.
translation.ja: 気のせいです　全て順調よ

translation.en: [doctor] You had a complex delivery, Ms. May. You lost a near-fatal amount of blood, and we nearly lost you.
translation.ja: 難産による大量出血であなたは危険な状態でした

translation.en: -[grunts] -I'll give you something to relax. Okay?
translation.ja: 楽になる薬を投与します

translation.en: -No, I want to see my baby. -Go to sleep.
I want to see my baby.
[nurse] The bleeding should ease up within two weeks. If it doesn't, give us a call, okay?
translation.ja: 出血が２週間以上続いたら連絡を

translation.en: And make sure that you take these meds only as instructed. Got it?
translation.ja: 薬は指示どおりに飲んでください
おやおや 生きてたのね

translation.en: I have been ringing and ringing, but you know that. [scoffs]
translation.ja: 何度も電話したでしょ

translation.en: What you trying to do? Snatch your body back?
translation.ja: 体型を戻そうとしてるの？

translation.en: And why is the door unlocked? Come here.
translation.ja: 玄関が無施錠よ おいで

translation.en: What do you mean, he left?
Oh my God. Gemina, why didn't you say something?
translation.ja: ジェミナ　なぜ黙ってたの？

translation.en: It's fine. I'm fine. It probably should have happened a long time ago.
translation.ja: 私は平気こうなる運命だったの

translation.en: Probably! But you thought Shawn shit ice cream.
translation.ja: ショーンを崇拝してたじゃない

translation.en: [Gemina] Maybe losing the baby was a blessing.
translation.ja: たぶん流産してよかったのよ

translation.en: And it should never have happened. None of it.
translation.ja: 絶対に防ぐべきだった

translation.en: That's why I had you guys at home. Just me and my midwife.
translation.ja: 私が あなたたちを産む時は自宅に助産師を呼んだの

translation.en: We pulled you out with our four hands.
-Your daddy just stood and watched. -Stood and watched.
And I told you what to do!
translation.ja: 自宅出産を勧めたのに

translation.en: -Shawn wanted to go to the hospital. -[mom] Shawn was not having a baby.
translation.ja: ショーンが病院と 産むのは あなた
あなたは優れた女性よ

translation.en: I'm in awe of you, Gemina.
[nurse] Make sure that you take these meds only as instructed. Got it?
translation.ja: 薬は指示どおりに飲んでください

translation.en: [doctor] This is why I stressed the importance of great self-care.
translation.ja: 体を大切にと言いましたよ

translation.en: Pregnant women have all kinds of symptoms.
translation.ja: 妊婦の体は不安定なんだ

translation.en: [doctor] Preeclampsia can go undetected until it's too late.
translation.ja: 子癇(しかん)前症は気付きにくい

translation.en: [Gemina] Why didn't you listen to me?
[man on recording] Hey, Gemina, it's James.
I'm just calling you back. Again. Um…
Yeah, I ran into your mom.
translation.ja: 君のお母さんに会った

translation.en: Just hit me back when you get a chance.
translation.ja: 都合のいい時に連絡して

translation.en: How did you get in here?
This isn't your home. Come on. Go to your own home.
translation.ja: さっさと自分の家に帰って

translation.en: [Gemina] I told you about the bleeding.
I told you about the pain. You weren't listening--
I know you have a high-pressure job, travel a lot--
translation.ja: 仕事や旅行が原因です

translation.en: I told you something wasn't right.
[doctor] Now I'm going to ask you to please stay calm.
Being disrespectful is not gonna help anything, Gemma.
translation.ja: 敬意を忘れずに　ジェマ

translation.en: [Gemina] This is why you don't have glass in the shower, Gemina.
translation.ja: やっぱりシャワー室にガラスは危険ね

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, it's me. It's James.
translation.ja: 俺だ　ジェイムスだよ

translation.en: Right. Oh my God. I'm sorry.
[chuckling] You scared the shit out of me.
You said you was freaked out, but the front door was unlocked.
At least, I… I thought I did.
Well, you get a low score for security, Gem.

translation.ja: おい 気にするなって

translation.en: -It's okay. It's okay. It's okay. -I'm a mess.
translation.ja: おい 気にするなって 混乱してる

translation.en: -[James] You're fine. -I don't know what's happening to me.
[James] I'm here. How about I get you a glass of water?
I think… I think someone's trying to kill me.
translation.ja: 誰かが私を殺そうとしてるの

translation.en: To kill you? Who? Like, what are you talking about?
translation.ja: 君を殺す？　何の話だ

translation.en: -Why would you say something like that? -James. My face.
translation.ja: なぜ そう思う？ この顔を見て

translation.en: I'm right here, man, and I ain't going nowhere.
translation.ja: 俺は どこにも行かない

translation.en: So, if you need me to take a look around, I'll take a look around.
translation.ja: 君が望むなら見回ってくる

translation.en: There, coast is clear. There's no one in here.
translation.ja: 異常なし　誰もいないよ

translation.en: Mmm. Searching the house like I was FBI.
-Come here. I know what this is. -What… What is?
translation.ja: 分かってるよ 何が？

translation.en: I'm the hero, and you're the damsel in distress.
translation.ja: 俺がヒーロー役で君は苦難の乙女だろ

translation.en: Look, I know you're lonely. I'm lonely too.
Are you ser-- You're a fucking psycho.
[splutters] Hold on. Seriously. What are you talking about?
translation.ja: 待て　どういうことだ

translation.en: James, I thought we were just friends.
You want to sit here and tell me you… you don't know what's up?
translation.ja: ここに座って君の話を聞けって？

translation.en: Bit of advice? Lock your fucking door.
♪ I fear that everything is happening In this world ♪ ♪ Some days it brings me to my knees ♪
translation.ja: “「黒人女性を守るには」ジェミナ･メイ”
